@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:26, topic:430163”][quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=532842.msg3895893#msg3895893 date=1327284088]
I downloaded every family guy episode for the first 9 seasons on my ipod from Megaupload… Am I going to have to pay millions? (Didn’t watch the whole video).
[/quote]
potentially, but hopefully no[/quote]

Well I had to borrow money from my Aunt so I could go ice skating today. If I end up having to owe millions to teh internetz, I’m fucked.

item.title: Is this true? :S
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:12, topic:430163”][quote author=t4 link=topic=532842.msg3894866#msg3894866 date=1327211359]
There are a LOT of MU users; it would be very hard to believe they’d name them all. But, we are dealing with people who have something to prove and unlimited money - so it’s hard to say…
[/quote]
I believe he said they have the server files, so wouldn’t they have the database of all the users and their ips? They wouldn’t have to ask for the names. Not sure about downloading though, that is, if you were an unregistered user. I would highly doubt they would save all of the ip’s for users that accessed their website and then append them to which files they downloaded.[/quote]
plus, it came out the the top uploaders were actually paid by MU - they’d definitely target them. Also, an IP is a lead - not someone’s full address/name. They’d need to contact all of the ISPs asking who had that IP at that time. Sure it’s possible, but a great deal of work.

Read full topic
